name: Touhou: Scarlet Curiosity | 東方紅輝心
description: The world of Touhou comes alive in this beautiful action RPG (featuring “bullet hell” elements, of course!). Infamous vampire Remilia Scarlet and her dutiful maid, Sakuya, set off to chase rumors of a massive monster, all while sending baddies flying with fluid action and signature skills!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 (2-core, 2.4GHz) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTS 450 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX 10.0
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 / AMD FX-6350 Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 950 / AMD Radeon R7 360 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX 10.0
